short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Nuke threads and filter posts by keyword, user, domain, and subreddit. Poof! 

 Works on both Reddit and Old Reddit!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allows you to hide posts and comments based on keywords, subreddits, domains, and users! Works on both Old Reddit and New Reddit! Features The Nuke, which bans all users that posted or commented on a given thread!

This extension is open source! Check out the code here: https://github.com/JosephKan3/redditFilters

Version 1.2
Fixes constant lag on change in DOM, so no more constant lag :D
